com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common.internal

Class ChunkProviderServerHook

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.minecraft.server.v1_8_R3.ChunkProviderServer
      • com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common.internal.ChunkProviderServerHook
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    net.minecraft.server.v1_8_R3.IChunkProvider

    public class ChunkProviderServerHook
extends net.minecraft.server.v1_8_R3.ChunkProviderServer
    A CPS Hook class that provides various new events, timings and other useful utilities. This is here so that other plugins can safely control internal behavior (NoLagg mainly).

    • Field Summary
